hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ssh vagrant@app-server-node-1 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -v <<EOF sudo service tomcat6 stop sudo rm -rf /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/pizza* sudo wget -O /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/pizza.war http://ci-node:8080/job/pizza-build/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/shop/ui/build/libs/ui-0.4-DEV.war sudo service tomcat6 start cd /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/pizza/WEB-INF/classes sudo rm logback.groovy sudo wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zutherb/AppStash/master/vagrant/provision/tomcat/logback.groovy EOF
